title: Ticket #2431: forgotten doc for #1249: multiple dest. for CONDOR_VIEW_HOST
description: See #1249. Ticket resolved and forgotten without the requested documentation and without making a new doc-only ticket.
remarks:
2011-Sep-08 10:24:02 by smoler:
With 7.7.1 release rather soon (tomorrow?), Karen started this forgotten documentation on behalf of eje that should have been done for 7.7.0. Every person notified on this ticket is responsible for checking the documentation commits and then making sure that correct, updated prose gets into the manual.

I have no idea what actually delimits a list for this particular config knob, so I probably guessed wrong. And, there's not nearly enough in the ticket to explain what this change is implementing, so I just dumped the example config in the ticket into the manual. That is insufficient.
check_ins:
2011-Sep-09 11:12   Check-in [27139]: Expanded the documentation for the new support for multiple CondorView servers on CONDOR_VIEW_HOST. ===GT:Fixed=== #2431 (By Erik Erlandson )
2011-Sep-08 10:14   Check-in [27124]: A partial attempt at insufficient documentation of changes to CONDOR_VIEW_SERVER. ===GT=== #1249 ===GT=== #2431 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
